name: Bitty Bonsai
description:
In Bitty Bonsai you grow a small bonsai tree. Prune the branches by clicking on them. Relax.

Bitty Bonsai is a Sharecart1000 game.

The "jam version" downloads are the version that was complete at the deadline of the Teacart 1k jam. The other versions have improvements that I made over the following week.
